title: Executive Order 6737-Cancelation of Portion of Chapter I of the Instructions to Diplomatic Officers
content: That portion of chapter I of the Instructions to Diplomatic Officers under the heading "Organization of the Department of State" is hereby canceled.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6737-Cancelation of Portion of Chapter I of the Instructions to Diplomatic Officers Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362513
